programme.title: The Chippo Academy, the start of the success
programme.desc: Youssef Chippo opened in 2019 an Academy of Football in Morocco. Recently some players have been selected with the different national teams. beIN visits the Chippo Academy and tells you the story behind this project.

programme.title: Morocco .. Champion of World Cup U20
programme.desc: Morocco capped off a historic run in Chile on October 2025, beating Argentina 2-0 to take home the trophy at the Under-20 World Cup. The result marked a first World Cup win for Morocco at any age-group level in the country's history. Watch best moments of this achievement exclusive on beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Real Madrid - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.
